name: Userscripts.org - Dark Carbon Theme
description:
This is Dark Carbon Theme for  http://userscripts.org/   ...enjoy!!! 

Some elements in this style are based on style 4177 by user 3059...thank you ;)

Important! :  Please inform me if you found your code's or artwork's inside this style are illegally against any terms and require  me to take it down!..i'll do it ASAP... 

Note- All necessary credits/contributors are named inside this style...if i missed one do inform me....thank you!

ps - please post your comments.... :)


Change log +++

updated: 22-04-2008
-----------------------------
minor adjustment....
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

/* :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: 
 * :::                 Userscripts.org - Dark Carbon Theme                :::
 * :::                                                                    :::
 * :::  Author        :  storm119                                         :::
 * :::  Updated       :  22 April 2008                                    :::
 * :::                :  http://userstyles.org/users/7491                 :::
 * :::                :                                                   :::
 * :::                :  Their code's or artwork's are included in        :::
 * :::                :  this style:-                                     :::
 * :::  Contributors  :                                                   :::
 * :::  Credits &     :  based on painted black - userscripts by          :::
 * :::  Thanks        :  whatrevolution http://userstyles.org/users/3059  :::
 * :::                :                                                   :::
 * :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: 
 */


@-moz-document url-prefix("http://userscripts.org/"),
		   url-prefix("http://www.userscripts.org/") {

body {
	background: #333 url("data:image/jpg;base64,") repeat !important;
	color: #ddd !important;
}
 
/* adjust to right a bit - now the text doesn't touch the screen edge! storm119 */ 
.container {
    margin-left: 7px !important;
}

/* horizontal line to left front-page - storm119 */
hr {
    height: 0 !important;
    border: 0 !important;
    margin-left: -9px !important;
    border-top: 1px solid #666 !important;
}

/* horizontal line - others */
#right hr {
    height: 0 !important;
    border: 0 !important;
    border-top: 1px solid #666 !important;
}

/* vertical line in front-page - storm119 */
.colborder {
    border-right: 1px solid #666 !important;
}

.s {
    background: none !important;
}

/* 2nd layer/background - storm119*/  
#content { 
    border-top: 1px solid #353333 !important;
	border-bottom: 2px solid #444 !important;
	border-right: 3px solid #444 !important;
	/*background: #353333 !important;*/
	background: #353333 url(data:image/png;base64,) repeat !important;
}

/* background forum post - author */  
.vcard { 
    background : #353333 !important; 
}

/* horizontal line post - author */
.post {
	border-top: 2px solid #353333 !important;
}

/* common text */

.entry-content,
p { 
	background: none !important;
	color: #999 !important; 
}

code {
    background: none !important;
    color: #1f1f1f !important; 
    font-style: italic !important;
}

label,
.role {
    background: none !important;
    color: #ddd !important;
}

a {
	text-decoration: none !important;
}

a:link {
    background: none !important;
    color: #E8E1BD !important;/*NavajoWhite*/
}

a:visited {
    color: #8B795E !important;/*NavajoWhite4*/ 
}

a:hover {
   	color:#ff6600 !important; /* dark orange*/
}

a:visited:hover {
    color: #1689FF !important; /* mediumblue */
    font-style: italic !important;
 }

/*sticky*/
td[class="c2"] { 
	color:  #4682B4 !important; /*SteelBlue*/
} 

button,
input,
select,
textarea {
   	border: 1px solid #bbb !important;
   	background-color: #444 !important;
   	color: #ddd !important;
   	margin: 2px !important;
}

button,
input[type="submit"],
#install_script > a {
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;
    background-repeat: repeat-x !important;
    border-color: #000 !important;
    color: #fff !important;
}

input[type="password"],
input[type="text"],
input:not([type]) {
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;
    background-repeat: repeat-x !important;
    border-color: #bbb !important;
    color: #ddd !important;
}

button:hover,
input:hover,
select:hover,
textarea:hover,
#install_script > a:hover {
   	border: 1px outset #bbb !important;
}

select:hover,
textarea:hover {
   	background-color: #222 !important;
}

button:hover,
input[type="radio"]:hover,
input[type="submit"]:hover,
select:hover {
   	cursor: pointer !important;
}

button:active, 
input:active, 
select:active,
#install_script > a:active {
   	background-color: #000 !important;
   	border: 1px inset #bbb !important;
   	font-style: normal !important;
}

blockquote {
   	background-color: #333 ! important;
   	color: #ccb7b7 !important;
   	border: 1px dashed #cccccc !important;
   	border-left: 3px solid #cccccc !important;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9 {
   	background-color: transparent !important; 
   	color: #ddd !important;
}

pre {
   	background-color: #080808 ! important;
   	color: #ccb7b7 !important;
   	border: 1px dashed #cccccc !important;
}

#header,
.stats {
   	background: #111 url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;
   	border-bottom: 3px solid #666 !important;
}

.stats {
   	border: 1px solid #666 !important;
}

img[src$="/userscripts.org.png"],
img[src*="/userscripts.org.png?"] {
   	/* Image from: http://6v8.gamboni.org/Localising-Flickr-Greasemonkey.html */
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
    height: 0 !important;
    padding-left: 48px !important;
    padding-top: 43px !important;
    width: 0 !important;
}

.sectionInner2,
div.download h3,
div.usedby h3,
div.seealso h3,
div.furtherreading h3,
div.indexread h3,
div.indexdownload h3  {
    background: #333 url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;
    background-repeat: repeat-x !important;
    color: #ddd !important;
}

/* table border - storm119*/
.c2 { 
	border-left: none !important; 
}

table tr td.script-meat { border-left: none !important; }

/* 1st row table - header " topic, post, views, last post" */
table tr th {
	background: #666666 !important;
	color: #ddd;
    border: 1px solid #666 !important;
}

/* 2nd row */  
table tr td {
    border: 1px solid #666 !important;
    border-right: none !important;
}

/* 2nd row vertical coloum - right */ 
.inv,
.lp {
    background : #777 !important;
    border: 1px solid #666 !important;
}

/* warning! notice & error - install script  */
p.notice, 
p.error,
p.sections,
.success { 
    background: #444 !important;
    border: 1px solid #666 !important; 
    color: #EE6363 !important; /*indianred*/
} 

table.posts tr td,
.entry-content {
   	border: none !important;
}

em,
.by_author {
   	background-color: #2a2a2a ! important;
   	color: #ddd !important;
   	border: 1px dashed #aaa !important;
}

.wide {
   	border-bottom: 1px dotted #666 !important;
}

.updated {
   	color: #9fc1cd !important;
}

/* modify the "result page" a bit */
.pagination { 
	vertical-align: bottom !important; 
	padding: .5em !important; 
}

.pagination a  { 
    font-size: 0.7em !important; 
    margin: 0 5px 0 5px !important;
}

.disabled {
	display: none !important;
}

.current {
	background: #666 !important;
	width: auto !important;
	border: 1px solid #999 !important;
	color: #fff !important;
	font-size: 1.2em !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    text-align: center !important;
}

/* removed ads google....sorry! - storm119 */
/*meta, script*/
iframe, 
div.ads { 
    display: none !important;
 }


}
